* BrightBlade watched Perndabot pass her a bit, actually seeing just how 
happy he was that he would soon be scrapping Maximals.
She smiled and shook her head, wishing that she had determination like that.
Still clutching the stasis ball to her chest she sighed and continued to 
walk towards her destination, thinking of just how she was going to get into 
such a secure base.
She looked up as she heard Perndabot�s question, knowing exactly what to 
say. *

� Scanner codes and how they function, the types of weapons and recording 
their weak spots, relaying an entire 3D cross section of the ship and it�s 
levels back to base. So on so forth. Anything that would be useful to us, 
things that could tip the scale in our favor the next time we attack.�
